getCozy.title: Comfort from the moment you crawl into bed.
getCozy.subtitle: Cozy Knit Cover
getCozy.description: A soft knit cover designed with added stretch so you can experience all the comfort your mattress has to offer.

fallAsleep.title: Features designed to lull you to sleep.
fallAsleep.subtitle: Casper Signature™ Foam with AirScape® Technology
fallAsleep.description: A responsive layer of foam is designed to soothe you to sleep with the perfect bit of bounce, while added AirScape® Technology keeps you at a comfortable temperature all night.

stayAsleep.title: Sleep deeper and without interruptions.
stayAsleep.subtitle: Premium Memory Foam
stayAsleep.description: Absorbs pressure and cradles your body to help you stay asleep.
